name: Norges Bank Investment Management
legal: Department of Norges Bank, the central bank of Norway
goal: Norges Bank Investment Management (NBIM) is the asset management division of Norges Bank, the central bank of Norway. NBIM manages the Government Pension Fund Global (GPFG) and Norway's Foreign Exchange Reserves (FXR)
interests: Banking and financial services, Budget, Economy, finance and the euro
euInitiatives: NBIM is predominantly interested in macro related initiatives, policies and legislative files which enable it to make asset allocation decisions
